statements.name: PROC DOWNLOAD
statements.description: Transfers files from the server to the client.
statements.help:
PROC DOWNLOAD 
	<data-set-options>
		<library-options>
		<external-file-options>
		<AFTER=date>;WHERE where-expression-1<logical-operator where-expression-n>;EXCLUDE list</MEMTYPE=mtype>;SELECT lib-member-list</MEMTYPE=mtype>;

statements.name: WHERE
statements.description: Selects observations from SAS data sets.

statements.name: SELECT
statements.description: Selects specific library members to download.
